features.featureTitle: Rebuild the entire frontend as a personal portfolio for Afnan Tahib. Replace all existing department-focused sections with a fully responsive single-page portfolio using a dark theme with blue/purple AI-inspired gradients, subtle glassmorphism UI, hover effects, micro-interactions, and smooth scroll animations. Apply consistent dark background colors, glassy card surfaces, and blue-to-purple gradient accents throughout every section and component. Use a modern sans-serif heading font paired with a clean body font. All existing department sections (Programs, Faculty, Labs, Placements, Research, Events, Achievements as department-centric) must be replaced with the personal portfolio sections described in subsequent requirements.

Implement a full-screen Hero section with: large bold name 'Afnan Tahib', subtitle 'AI & Data Science Undergraduate', intro text 'Passionate about Machine Learning, Data Analytics, and building intelligent solutions that solve real-world problems.', two CTA buttons ('View Projects' smooth-scrolls to the Projects section, 'Contact Me' smooth-scrolls to the Contact section), and a live animated neural network or abstract AI grid canvas effect as the background.

Implement an About Me section with the following personal details: currently pursuing B.Tech in Artificial Intelligence & Data Science at Priyadarshini Engineering College, Vaniyambadi; career goal of Aspiring AI Engineer and Research Enthusiast; strong interest in ML, Data Science, and intelligent systems; strengths: Logical thinking, problem-solving, fast learner. Display this information using a clean card or two-column layout with scroll-triggered animations.

Implement a Skills section using animated skill cards or progress bars, grouped into three categories: Programming (Python, C++, SQL), AI/ML (Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Data Analytics, NLP (Basic), Computer Vision (Basic)), and Tools & Libraries (Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-learn, TensorFlow (Basic), Tableau, Power BI, Matplotlib). Each skill entry should display its name and a visual indicator (animated progress bar or badge card). Apply staggered scroll-in animations.

Implement a Projects section with professional card layout containing exactly two project cards: (1) Title 'FUTURE_DS_01', description 'Data Science and Analytics project showcasing practical implementation of data processing and analysis techniques.', tech stack tags (Python, Data Science, Analytics), and a 'GitHub' button linking to https://github.com/Afnan-Tahib/FUTURE_DS_01; (2) Title 'Sales Performance Dashboard – Superstore Analysis', description 'Interactive Tableau dashboard analyzing sales and profit performance with data visualization insights.', tech stack tags (Tableau, Data Visualization, Analytics), and a 'Live Demo' button linking to https://public.tableau.com/app/profile/afnan.tahib/viz/SalesPerformanceDashboardSuperstoreAnalysis_17717554808110/SalesProfitPerformanceDashboard?publish=yes. Cards should have glassmorphism styling and hover lift effects.

Implement an Achievements & Certifications section with three subsections: (1) Online Certifications displayed as badge-style cards with placeholder certification entries; (2) Workshops Attended displayed as a list or cards with placeholder entries; (3) Hackathons & Research as a placeholder subsection indicating upcoming entries. Include scroll animations for each subsection.

Implement an Education section displaying: Degree — B.Tech in Artificial Intelligence & Data Science; Institution — Priyadarshini Engineering College, Vaniyambadi; Status — Undergraduate Student (currently pursuing). Use a clean timeline or card layout with the institution name, degree, and current status prominently displayed.

Implement a Resume section containing a prominently styled 'Download Resume' button. The button should link to a placeholder PDF path (e.g., /assets/resume.pdf) and open in a new tab. Include a short label such as 'My Resume' or 'Curriculum Vitae' as the section heading.

Implement a Contact section with: contact details showing email afnantahibkondalam@gmail.com, GitHub https://github.com/Afnan-Tahib/FUTURE_DS_01, and LinkedIn https://www.linkedin.com/in/afnan-tahib-kundalam-7a3881384 as clickable icons/links; a contact form with fields for Name, Email, and Message with a Submit button that stores submissions in the backend. Style the section with glassmorphism cards and gradient accents.

Implement a site footer with: quick navigation links to all major sections (About, Skills, Projects, Achievements, Education, Resume, Contact); social media icons linking to GitHub (https://github.com/Afnan-Tahib/FUTURE_DS_01) and LinkedIn (https://www.linkedin.com/in/afnan-tahib-kundalam-7a3881384); and a minimal copyright line reading '© 2024 Afnan Tahib. All rights reserved.'

Implement a responsive sticky navigation bar for the portfolio with 'Afnan Tahib' as the brand/logo text on the left, and navigation links (About, Skills, Projects, Achievements, Education, Resume, Contact) on the right. Each link smoothly scrolls to its corresponding section. Include a hamburger menu on mobile that expands to show nav links. Apply glassmorphism background on scroll.
